name: Burmy Sandy Cloak
flavorText: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

abilities.name: Wear Cloak
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Sandy Cloak is your Active Pokémon, you may search your discard for a basic Fighting Energy card and attach it to Burmy Sandy Cloak.

attacks.name: Sandy Cloak Tackle
attacks.text: If Burmy Sandy Cloak has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.
